1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, everyone except Phoebe is there as Rachel enters
carrying a magazine.

lines.Line: So, I’m in my apartment doing the Soap Opera Digest crossword puzzle, and guess who the clue is for three down. (She hands the magazine to Joey.
(reading) Three down, Days Of Our Lives star blank Tribbiani. That’s me!! I’m blank!

How cool is this?! We know three down! I’m touching three down!
(She has her hand on his shoulder.
Three down knows I’m married, what’s three down doin’
So did they call you to tell you your name’s gonna be in this

No. They really like me over there. They want to do a big profile on me,
but I said no

Remember what happened the last time I did an interview for them? I said I
write a lot of my own lines, and then the writers got mad and made my character fall down
the elevator shaft. So who knows what I might say this time

If only there was something in your head to control the things
you say. (Joey nods his agreement.

Oh, come on Joey! You will totally keep it in check this time, and plus
y’know the publicity would be really good for your career! And you deserve that! And
if you do the interview you can mention, oh I don’t know, gal pal Rachel Green
Is that gal pal spelled L-O-S-E-R
Is that gal pal spelled L-O-S-E-R
Is that gal pal spelled L-O-S-E-R
Okay, don’t listen to him. Please

Fine! All right, I’ll do it. But hey! You guys have to be at the next
table so you can stop me if I y’know, start to say something stupid
Just then or-or all the time, ‘cause we-we have jobs y’know

Come on! We will be there for you the whole time! Just remember gal pal Rachel Green. (Excited) Ha-ha! I’m gonna be in Soap Opera Digest! And not just in the dumb crossword puzzle. (Looks at Joey.) Seriously, proud of you

2.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's and Ross's, Chandler is entering and when he closes the
door Joey pops his head out of the fort like before, but this time he's wearing a cowboy
hat.

lines.Line:
Well, I see you've had a very productive day. Don't you think the
cowboy hat is a little much

(popping up behind Joey wearing an Indian headdress) Come on, it's
fun

All right! (He joins them in the fort and comes up putting on a
bonnet.) Isn't this a woman's hat
Dude, stop talking crazy and make us some tea
Dude, stop talking crazy and make us some tea
Dude, stop talking crazy and make us some tea

The One With The Free Porn, Chandler and Joey are
lamenting the fact that every beautiful woman they see doesn’t want to have sex right
then and there like in porn.
Y’know what, we have to turn off the porn

lines.Character: (Goes over and picks up the remote
lines.Line: Goes over and picks up the remote.

lines.Character: (Chandler turns off the porn and sets the remote down
lines.Line: Chandler turns off the porn and sets the remote down.
You wanna see if we still have it
Chandler turns on the TV and…
Chandler turns on the TV and…

In my spare time I uh, read to the blind. And I’m also a mento for
the kids.(The gang shake their heads.) Y’know a mento, a role model. (Chandler bites
his fist to keep from talking.

lines.Character: (Chandler tries to jump over the couch but everyone stops him
lines.Line: Chandler tries to jump over the couch but everyone stops him.

Well umm, another thing our readers always want to know is how
our soap stars stay in such great shape. Do you have some kind of fitness regime
Uh, we stars just try to eat right and get lots of exercise
Uh, we stars just try to eat right and get lots of exercise

lines.Character: [Another set of flashbacks begin with Episode 521
lines.Line:
The One With The Ball, Joey and Ross
are throwing a ball around.

Wow! You realize that we've been throwing this ball, without dropping
it, for like an hour

Yeah. I realized it about a half-hour ago but I didn't want to say
anything 'cause I didn't want to jinx it
Wow! We are pretty good at this
Wow! We are pretty good at this
Wow! We are pretty good at this
Hey! We totally forgot about lunch

Oh, I-I, I think that's the first time I ever missed a meal! (Checks
his pants.) Yeah, my pants are a little loose
The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance.
The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance.

3.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's apartment, Chandler is entering to find Joey bingeing on the
food from the fridge. Joey isn’t doing all that well.

lines.Line:
The fridge broke. I have to eat everything. Cold cuts, ice cream,
limes—Hey, what was in that brown jar
The One With All the Cheesecakes.
You guys, this is Shelley, she’s interviewing me for Soap Opera Digest, and Shelley, this are my friends

(interrupting him) Hi! I’m gal pal Rachel Green, and if you want
the dirt, I’m the one you come too. This might be Joey’s baby (rubbing her
stomach), who knows? I’m just kidding—Seriously, (leans into the cassette
recorder Shelley is using) gal pal Rachel Green

(leaning into the recorder as well) Who just lost the respect of her
unborn child

Umm, I’m gonna just go get this warmed up. (She takes her
coffee mug up to the counter.

(returning) So, as Joey’s friends, is there anything that
you guys think our readers ought to know
Uh no, no just-just that he is a great guy
(scoffs at him) Yeah, that’s gonna get you into Soap Opera Digest. Well I…(leans into the microphone again)…I would just like to say that Joey truly has enriched the days of our lives

Umm, I…I just think you don’t expect someone so hot to be so
sweet

Umm, I…I just think you don’t expect someone so hot to be so
sweet
Oh! I like that. What’s your name
How do you spell that? So we can get it right

Oh okay, it’s P as in Phoebe, H as in hoebe, O as in oebe, E as in
ebe, B as in bee-bee and E as in (In an Australian accent) ‘Ello there mate
Great! Well, it was nice meeting all of you
Great! Well, it was nice meeting all of you

So it seems like you have a lot of friends, who would you say
is your best friend

lines.Character:
[They gang all lean back to listen better, and this starts another series of
flashbacks. The first one is from Episode 214
lines.Line:
The One With The Prom Video, Rachel has
just found the bracelet that Joey gave Chandler, which is after he bought one to replace
it.

How come you have two?

Chandler: Well this one's for you.

Joey: Get out.

Chandler: No, I can't. No-no, listen, I, I know how much this means to you and I also know that this is about more than just jewelry, (Puts bracelet on Joey) it's about you and me and the fact that we're (Reading bracelet) best buds.

Joey: Wow, is this friendship? I think so. Check it out, we're bracelet buddies.

Chandler: That's what they'll call us.

[The next one is from Episode 618: The One Where Ross Dates A Student.

5.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Joey is reading a script as Ross enters

lines.Line:
All right I've been feeling incredibly guilty about this, because I wanna
be a good friend, and damnit I am a good friend. So just, just shut up and close your eyes
(kisses Joey)

Wow, you are a good friend, 'course the audition was this morning, and I
didn't get it. But that was a hell of a kiss. Rachel is a very lucky girl

The One With Chandler’s Work Laugh, Joey and
Phoebe are betting on who will reach the treat the fastest, the chick or the duck.

All right. Let's get the contestants out of their isolation booths.
(He removes the waste bucket that's over the duck and the laundry basket that's over the
chicken.) And they're off! (He puts his foot in front of the chick, stopping it from
moving.
Get your foot off my contestant! Judge
Get your foot off my contestant! Judge
Get your foot off my contestant! Judge
And the duck gets the Nutter-Butter

(turning from Ross.) No!! Hey-hey that's not a Nutter-Butter, that's
just an old Wonton

The One With The Jellyfish, where Monica, Joey, and
Chandler are relating that tragic day they spent on the beach.
I’d seen this thing on The Discovery Channel..
Wait a minute! I saw that! On The Discovery Channel, yeah! About jellyfish and how if you... (Stops suddenly and turns to look at Monica) Ewwww!! You peed on yourself?

You can’t say that!! You-you don’t know!! I mean I thought
I was gonna pass out from the pain! Anyway I-I tried, but I-I couldn’t...bend that
way. So... (Looks at Joey.

That’s right I stepped up! She’s my friend and she needed
help! And if I had too, I’d pee on anyone of you
Umm, no. No best friend, no. Just a lot of close friends

So umm, now back to the show. How does it feel to have a huge
gay fan base
Really? Me? Wow! I don’t even know any huge gay people
It hurts me. It physically hurts me
Now, off the record, you’re not

lines.Character: [Another group of flashbacks begin with Episode 513
lines.Line:
The One With Joey’s Bag. Joey
is carrying the bag and has entered Central Perk to the amusement of Ross and Chandler.

What? Are you referring to my man's bag? At first, I thought it just
looked good, but it's practical too. Check it out! It's got compartments for all your
stuff! Your wallet! Your keys! Your address book

The One Where They’re Up All Night, Joey and
Ross are deciding how to climb down the final part of the fire escape.

Okay. Now-now-now should I climb down your front so we’re face to
face or-or should I climb down your back so we’re-we’re butt to face

lines.Character: (Ross steps onto the bottom rung of the ladder and then steps on Joey’s chest
lines.Line: Ross steps onto the bottom rung of the ladder and then steps on Joey’s chest.
(grunting) Oh my… How much do you weigh Ross?

I prefer not to answer that right now, I’m still carrying a little
holiday weight

lines.Character:
(Ross continues to climb down. He puts his other foot further down on Joey’s
torso, but that doesn’t work very well and he’s forced to wrap his legs around
Joey. Which then forces Joey to get a nice and close view of Ross’s crotch
lines.Line:
Ross continues to climb down. He puts his other foot further down on Joey’s
torso, but that doesn’t work very well and he’s forced to wrap his legs around
Joey. Which then forces Joey to get a nice and close view of Ross’s crotch.

Y’know, when we talked about face to face, I don’t think we
thought it all the way through

6.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's, Joey and Ross are napping together again and both wake up at
the same time.

lines.Character:
(Suddenly Rachel clears her throat and the camera cuts to the rest of the gang staring
at them. Needless to say Joey and Ross are shocked and slowly turn their heads to see the
gang
lines.Line:
Suddenly Rachel clears her throat and the camera cuts to the rest of the gang staring
at them. Needless to say Joey and Ross are shocked and slowly turn their heads to see the
gang.

Uh me? Gay? No! No. No, but I have a number of close friends who are.
(Chandler and Ross look at each other.

So, let’s talk about women. I’m sure our female
readers will be interested to know about your romantic life

lines.Character: [Another series of flashbacks begins with Episode 413
lines.Line:
The One With Rachel’s
Crush, Joey is telling Rachel and Phoebe how he picks up women.

Oh-oh-oh-oh, how I do it is, I look a woman up and down and say,
"Hey, how you doin’?

lines.Character: (Phoebe looks at him, and then giggles and looks away
lines.Line: Phoebe looks at him, and then giggles and looks away.

7.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, everyone is reading Joey’s interview.

lines.Line:
Wow! I can’t believe they didn’t put it in the part where you
said you didn’t watch soap operas

Yeah, I called the lady about that. I told her I was just joking. She was
pretty nice about that
You slept with her didn’t you
You slept with her didn’t you
Wow! This picture of you sure is steamy

Oh yeah, that’s just a little something for my huge gay fan base.
(Winks at him.
Did you just wink at me
Did you just wink at me
Did you just wink at me
Hey, you’re the one that loves the picture
